EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of WBSV.VI M&A conference call or presentation 18-Dec-20 1:00pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Wienerberger AG to Discuss the Strategic Rational and Financial Implications of the Acquisition with Meridian Brick LLC Call
Vienna Dec 29, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Wienerberger AG M&A conference call or presentation Friday, December 18, 2020 at 1:00:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
